project.name: The Vistas Summerlin Real Estate Website
project.description: Hyperlocal real estate website serving 28 subcommunities in The Vistas Summerlin with focus on equity reports, property search, and community engagement

tasks.title: Analyze Current Website Structure
tasks.description: Review existing HTML and Next.js components to understand current architecture and identify optimization opportunities
tasks.details: Analyze the current website structure including HTML pages, Next.js components, and existing functionality. Document current SEO implementation, mobile responsiveness, and conversion tools. Identify areas for improvement based on the hyperlocal strategy outlined in the PRD.
tasks.testStrategy: Create comprehensive audit report documenting current state, performance metrics, and recommendations for improvement.

subtasks.title: Audit Current HTML Structure
subtasks.description: Review existing HTML pages and their structure
subtasks.details: Analyze index.html, pages directory, and component structure. Document current page hierarchy, navigation, and content organization.

subtasks.title: Analyze Next.js Components
subtasks.details: Examine src/app structure, components directory, and existing React components. Document component hierarchy, state management, and data flow patterns.

tasks.title: Implement Hyperlocal SEO Architecture
tasks.description: Create hub-and-spoke architecture with dedicated pages for each of the 28 subcommunities
tasks.details: Implement SEO strategy focusing on hyperlocal content for 28 subcommunities. Create dedicated pages for each community with minimum 1,500 words covering local market data, school information, amenities, and lifestyle factors. Implement proper schema markup including RealEstateListing, LocalBusiness, and Organization schemas.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all 28 community pages are created with proper content depth, schema markup validation, and local keyword optimization.

tasks.title: Optimize Core Web Vitals and Performance
tasks.description: Achieve sub-3-second load times and meet 2025 Core Web Vitals requirements
tasks.details: Optimize website performance to meet Core Web Vitals requirements: Largest Contentful Paint under 2.5 seconds, Interaction to Next Paint under 200 milliseconds, and Cumulative Layout Shift under 0.1. Implement image optimization with next-generation formats (WebP, AVIF), responsive images with srcset attributes, and CDN deployment.
tasks.testStrategy: Run Lighthouse audits and Core Web Vitals testing to ensure 95%+ pass rates across all pages.

tasks.title: Implement Mobile-First Design and PWA
tasks.description: Optimize for mobile users (76% of homebuyers) and implement Progressive Web App capabilities
tasks.details: Implement mobile-first design patterns with bottom navigation, floating action buttons, swipeable image galleries, and pull-to-refresh functionality. Convert to Progressive Web App (PWA) architecture for app-like experiences without app store downloads. Ensure offline functionality for saved properties.
tasks.testStrategy: Test on multiple mobile devices and browsers, verify PWA installation prompts, and validate offline functionality.

tasks.title: Develop Home Valuation Tools
tasks.description: Implement equity report tools with progressive profiling to achieve 7%+ conversion rates
tasks.details: Create home valuation tools with progressive profiling starting with minimal data collection (name, email, property address). Implement exit-intent popups triggered when visitors engage with specific listings. Provide instant preliminary estimates while requiring contact information for detailed CMAs. Include neighborhood-specific market insights and trust signals.
tasks.testStrategy: A/B test different form configurations and track conversion rates to achieve target 7%+ conversion rate.

tasks.title: Enhance Property Search Widget
tasks.description: Optimize property search with intelligent features and visual results
tasks.details: Implement intelligent search bars with autocomplete and address suggestions. Hide advanced filters under progressive disclosure to focus on core criteria (price, location, property type). Create visual search results in grid/card layouts with high-quality images and lazy loading. Implement schema markup for rich snippets.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality across different devices and browsers, verify autocomplete accuracy, and validate schema markup.

tasks.title: Implement AI-Powered Chatbot
tasks.description: Deploy conversational AI with multi-channel integration and CRM synchronization
tasks.details: Implement AI chatbot with 50%+ reply rates through platforms like Luxury Presence AI Lead Nurture Tool. Include multi-channel integration (website, social media, WhatsApp), multilingual support, CRM synchronization, and direct calendar integration for showing bookings. Implement automated valuation models for identifying likely sellers.
tasks.testStrategy: Test chatbot responses across different channels and scenarios, verify CRM integration, and monitor reply rates.

tasks.title: Create Community-Focused Content Strategy
tasks.description: Develop neighborhood-specific content and local authority building
tasks.details: Create weekly content highlighting local events, business openings, and community stories for each subcommunity. Develop neighborhood-specific visual identities and local character. Implement content calendar and automated content creation systems. Build partnerships with local businesses and micro-influencers.
tasks.testStrategy: Monitor content engagement rates and local social media interactions, targeting 50%+ increase in engagement.

tasks.title: Implement Trust Signals and Authority Indicators
tasks.description: Add social proof, certifications, and local expertise badges
tasks.details: Display number of completed valuations, show real-time notifications of recent requests, and prominently feature professional certifications and local market expertise badges. Implement customer testimonials, success stories, and neighborhood-specific achievements. Add trust badges and security indicators.
tasks.testStrategy: A/B test different trust signal placements and monitor conversion rate improvements.

tasks.title: Setup Analytics and Conversion Tracking
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive analytics tracking across all 28 communities
tasks.details: Implement comprehensive analytics tracking including home valuation conversion rates, property search engagement, Core Web Vitals monitoring, and community content engagement. Set up conversion funnels, heat mapping, and user behavior tracking. Create automated reporting dashboards.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all tracking codes are firing correctly and create baseline metrics for future optimization efforts.
